articles.description: Some market players have stuck their neck out with price calls for what could be another volatile year.
articles.content:
A worsening macroeconomic climate and the collapse of industry giants like FTX and Terra have weighed on bitcoin's price this year.
2022 was a rough year for crypto. More than $1.3 trillion was wipe… [+6399 chars]
